ERROR_EMPTY_DATA: Erè: done vid yo bay yo
ERROR_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND: Erè: kolòn '{}' pa jwenn nan dataframe
ERROR_COLUMNA_NO_EXISTE: Kolòn '{}' pa egziste nan dataframe la
not_found: Pa gen okenn fonksyon yo te rele "{non}" yo te jwenn.
call:
rele (non, tape = okenn, chemen = okenn, poz = 5, strik = vre)
Rechèch pou yon dosye pa non (ak opsyonèlman kalite) nan yon katab bay (oswa soti nan CWD) recursive anba ak Lè sa a, egal,
ak charj li depann sou kalite li yo otomatikman.

Paramèt:
    Non (STR): Non baz nan dosye a, san yo pa ekstansyon.
    Kalite (str, si ou vle): Ekstansyon espere ('CSV', 'JSON', 'XML').
    chemen (str, si ou vle): premye chemen nan rechèch soti nan.
    Timeout (int, si ou vle): tan rechèch maksimòm nan segonn.
    Strik (bool, si ou vle): Si vre, ogmante erè si dosye miltip ki gen menm non an yo te jwenn.

Retounen: kontni an nan dosye a jwenn oswa okenn.
load_user_translations:
load_user_translations (lang_path = "lang.json")
Charj itilizatè-defini tradiksyon ki sòti nan yon dosye JSON ak melanje yo ak tradiksyon yo default.

Paramèt:
    Lang_path (str, si ou vle): chemen nan dosye a tradiksyon itilizatè. Défaut nan "Lang.json".

Konpòtman:
    - Si dosye a egziste epi li valab JSON, melanje sa li yo ak tradiksyon default
    - Si dosye a pa egziste, kenbe sèlman tradiksyon default
    - Montre yon popup avètisman si dosye a egziste men li pa ka chaje
    - Updates Global _Translations Dictionary yo

Remak: yo dwe fonksyon sa a dwe rele anvan ou sèvi ak t () fonksyon an pou tradiksyon itilizatè yo pran efè.
switch:
Amelyore sistèm switch-ka pou Python. Sipò:
- Plizyè kle matche pou chak ka
- Koresponn ak pa valè, kalite, regex, lambda fonksyon, oswa klas la
- Panda ak Numpy Done Estrikti Sipò
- Si ou vle ekzekisyon async nan ka yo
- Koresponn ak-tout mòd pou egzekite plizyè ka matche
- Mode debug yo louvri sesyon ka matche
async_switch:
Anbalaj pou enstans switch nan mòd async. Paramèt:
- Valè: valè a matche ak kont ka yo defini.
- ** Kwargs: agiman mo kle si ou vle pase dirèkteman nan klas la switch. Sa yo ka gen ladan:
  - Match_all (bool): Egzekite tout ka matche olye pou yo kanpe nan premye la.
  - debug (bool): enprime ki ka matche ak sa ki egzekite.
  - async_mode (bool): pa ta dwe pase manyèlman isit la (toujou fòse yo vre).
Egzanp: asyncswitch ('alo', match_all = vre, debug = vre) (...)
no_errors_found: Pa gen erè sentaks yo te jwenn!
provide_file_path: Tanpri bay yon chemen dosye yo tcheke
file_not_found_any: Pa gen okenn dosye yo te rele '{non}' yo te jwenn nan '{chemen}'
file_ambiguous: Dosye miltip yo te rele '{non}' jwenn: {Kalite}. Espesifye kalite a oswa itilize strik = fo.
t: Retounen tèks la lokalize pou yon kle bay ki baze sou lang lan chwazi.
show_gui_popup_description:
Montre yon fenèt popup ak kontni tèks ak vizyalizasyon si ou vle.
Manch tou de CLI ak anviwònman kaye Jupyter.

Karakteristik:
- Kopi/sove chanjman fonctionnalités ki baze sou tab aktif
- Bon figi manyen nan Jupyter
- Netwaye revokasyon fenèt la

Args:
    Tit (STR): Tit fenèt
    Kontni (STR): kontni tèks yo montre
    Fig (matplotlib.figure.fig, si ou vle): Pre-kreye figi
    plot_function (callable, si ou vle): fonksyon ki jenere yon figi
    plot_args (dict, si ou vle): agiman pou plot_function
redundant_true: Konparezon redondants ak vre, sèvi ak valè a dirèkteman
redundant_false: Konparezon redondants ak fo, sèvi ak 'pa' olye
none_comparison: Konparezon ak okenn ta dwe itilize 'se' olye pou yo '=='
not_true_recommendation: Sèvi ak '! = Vrè' pa rekòmande, konsidere senplifye kondisyon an
not_false_recommendation: Sèvi ak '! = Fo' pa rekòmande, konsidere lè l sèvi avèk yon kondisyon pozitif
help_usage: Sèvi ak èd ('function_name') pou detay sou yon fonksyon espesifik
help_error: Erè: fonksyon '{}' pa egziste oswa pa gen okenn dokiman
non_graph_preview_available: Preview ki pa Peye-grafik ki disponib
async_preview_not_available:
Egzanp async pa ka montre nan preview senk.
Sèvi ak 'tann asyncswitch (...)' nan anviwònman async.
scatter_description: Kreye yon konplo gaye nan visualized relasyon ki genyen ant de varyab kontinyèl.
lineplot_description: Kreye yon liy trase ideyal pou seri tan oswa te bay lòd done nan kategori.
kdeplot_description: Kreye yon istogram lis lè l sèvi avèk estimasyon dansite Kernel.
violinplot_description: Montre distribisyon done quantitative atravè plizyè kategori.
pairplot_description: Kreye relasyon pè nan yon dataset ki montre tou de distribisyon jwenti ak majinal.
countplot_description: Yon konplo ba ki montre frekans nan done nan kategori.
lmplot_description: Plots done ak yon modèl retou annaryè lineyè anfòm ak entèval konfyans.
jointplot_description: Konbine konplo gaye ak istogram oswa simityè KDE sou marges yo.
swarmplot_description: Montre tout obsèvasyon ansanm ak reprezantasyon distribisyon kache a.
regplot_description: Plots done ak yon modèl retou annaryè anfòm ak lòd polinòm si ou vle.
barplot_description: Montre estimasyon pwen ak entèval konfyans kòm ba rektangilè.
stripplot_description: Yon konplo gaye kote yon varyab se nan kategori ak jitter pou fè pou evite sipèpoze.
large_plot_note: Remak: trase sa a ka pran yon moman pou rann akòz gwosè li
preview_not_available: Preview entèaktif pa disponib pou fonksyon sa a
get_moda_description: Kalkile mòd la (valè ki pi souvan) nan yon dataset. Ka retounen valè a ak konte frekans li yo.
get_media_description: Kalkile vle di nan aritmetik (mwayèn) nan yon dataset. Manch NAN valè opsyonèlman.
get_median_description: Kalkile medyàn lan (valè mwayen) nan yon dataset. Manch NAN valè opsyonèlman.
get_rank_description: Kalkile ranje a (diferans ant max ak min) nan yon kolòn dataframe.
get_desv_description: Kalkile devyasyon estanda a nan yon kolòn DataFrame.
disp_description: Retounen mezi dispèsyon (ranje, divèjans, devyasyon estanda) pou yon kolòn DataFrame.
call_description: Rechèch pou ak li dosye nan fòma diferan (CSV, JSON, XML) ak opsyon rechèch fleksib.
check_syntax_description: Analyzes Python code for syntax errors, undefined names, and style issues.
createDB_description: Factory function to create a database connection instance.
exportData_description: Exports data from database tables to various formats (CSV, JSON, XML, SQL, Excel, etc.).
addTable_description: Adds a new table to the database with specified columns and constraints.
mergeTable_description: Merges multiple tables using SQL logic with different join types.
join_description: Performs SQL joins between tables with various join types.
drop_description: Drops tables from the database, optionally with cascade.
cascadeDelete_description: Performs cascade deletion based on a condition, handling dependencies.
recursiveQuery_description: Executes recursive queries using Common Table Expressions (CTE).
windowFunction_description: Applies window functions (ROW_NUMBER, RANK, etc.) to table data.
executeRawSQL_description: Executes raw SQL queries directly on the database.
show_description: Displays database tables and data in a graphical interface.
hbar_description: Creates a horizontal bar chart with customizable labels and colors.
vbar_description: Creates a vertical bar chart with customizable labels and colors.
pie_description: Creates a pie chart with customizable labels, colors, and percentage formatting.
boxplot_description: Creates a box plot to visualize distribution of data across categories.
histo_description: Creates a histogram to visualize distribution of a numeric variable.
heatmap_description: Creates a heatmap to visualize matrix-like data with color coding.
table_description: Creates a table visualization from data arrays or DataFrames.
normalize_description: Normalizes an array between 0 and 1 using min-max scaling.
conditional_description: Applies logical conditions to generate a new column in a DataFrame.
convert_file_description: Converts files between different formats (SHP, DBF, XML, etc.) to CSV.
Switch_description: Synchronous switch implementation with multiple pattern matching formats.
switch_description: Wrapper function for natural syntax usage of the synchronous switch.
AsyncSwitch_description: Asynchronous switch implementation with multiple pattern matching formats.
async_switch_description: Wrapper function for natural syntax usage of the asynchronous switch.
config_description: Global configuration dictionary for module settings.
fig_to_img_description: Converts a matplotlib figure to an image array for use in other visualizations.
format_number_description: Formats numbers with customizable decimal places and percentage formatting.
load_user_translations_description: Loads user-defined translation files to extend or override default translations.
register_description: Decorator to register functions or classes in the global REGISTRY.
set_language_description: Sets the current language for translations.
t_description: Translation function that returns the translated string for a given key in the current language.
